headline: For The Record Will Be Acquired by Tyler Technologies
summary: For The Record announced today it has entered into a definitive agreement to be acquired by Tyler Technologies, Inc (NYSE: TYL) for an enterprise value of $258 million. The acquisition will help to further empower the public sector by accelerating the justice process and creating significant courtroom efficiencies.

headline: Tyler Technologies to Acquire For The Record
summary: PLANO, Texas, February 02, 2026--Tyler Technologies announced today it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire For The Record, a digital court-recording pioneer.
